Attention

Class abstraction to hold notifications that are not a direct reply and not part of the general feed.

saveNew

public static function saveNew(Notice $notice,  
Profile $target,  
 $reason = null)

Save a new attention

Parameters

  • Notice notice - the notice to make an attention for
  • Profile target - the user this is an attention for
  • string reason - the reason this is brought to their attenntion

Return

  • att - constructed attention object
